    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic">Year Ended December
31, 2007 Compared to Year Ended December 31, 2006</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Revenues</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Operating
revenue increased by $40.0 million, or 11.3%, to $392.7 million in 2007 from
$352.7 million in 2006.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Forward
Air</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Forward
Air operating revenue increased $24.0 million, or 6.8%, to $376.7 million in
2007 from $352.7 million in 2006.&#160;&#160;Forward Air revenue accounted for
95.9% and 100.0% of consolidated operating revenue during 2007 and 2006,
respectively.&#160;&#160;</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Airport-to-airport
revenue, which is the largest component of Forward Air operating revenue,
increased $11.7 million, or 3.9%, to $313.2 million in 2007 from $301.5 million
in 2006.&#160;&#160;Airport-to-airport revenue accounted for 83.1% of the
segment&#8217;s operating revenue during 2007, compared to 85.5% during 2006. The
increase in airport-to-airport revenue was driven by a 2.3% increase in tonnage
and a 1.6% increase&#160;in revenue per pound, including the impact of fuel
surcharges.&#160;&#160;The increase in tonnage was driven by new
airport-to-airport business generated by Forward Air Complete, our pick-up and
delivery product introduced during the second half of 2006, our December 2007
acquisition of Black Hawk, and the positive impact of a competitor ceasing
operations during the fourth quarter of 2007.&#160;&#160;These increases were
partially offset by a generally weak shipping environment.&#160;&#160;The
increase in average revenue per pound substantially resulted from increased
customer utilization of Forward Air Complete, increased fuel surcharges to
offset rising fuel costs, and rate increases implemented in March
2007.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Logistics
revenue, which is primarily truckload brokerage and priced on a per mile basis,
increased $11.3 million, or 36.1%, to $42.6 million in 2007 from $31.3 million
in 2006.&#160;&#160;The increase in logistics revenue is mainly the result of
our &#8220;Completing the Model&#8221; strategic initiative to grow these services. We are
placing emphasis on capturing a larger percentage of truckload opportunities and
correspondingly increasing our access to sufficient truckload capacity through
the use of third-party transportation providers.&#160;&#160;During 2007, we
increased the number of miles driven to support our logistics revenue by
60.5%.&#160;&#160;The average revenue per mile of our logistics product,
including the impact of fuel surcharges, decreased 15.0% for 2007 versus 2006.
The decrease in our revenue per mile is largely due to the weak shipping
environment and the change in our business mix resulting from our efforts to
capture additional truckload opportunities as well as utilizing truckload
opportunities to cost effectively position our owner-operators within our
airport-to-airport network.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Other
revenue, which includes warehousing services and terminal
handling&#160;increased $1.0 million to $20.9 million, a 5.0% increase from
$19.9 million for the same period in 2006.&#160;&#160;The increase was primarily
due to increased handling and storage revenue due to new services offered
through our newly expanded facilities.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">
        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
      </div>
      <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">25</font></div>
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
          <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="HDR">
        <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
      </div>
    </div><br>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">FASI</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">FASI
operating revenue of $16.0 million represents revenue earned through our new
pool distribution service acquired with the acquisition of certain assets and
liabilities of USAC&#160;on July 30, 2007.&#160;&#160;The pool distribution
business is seasonal and operating revenues tend to be higher in the third and
fourth quarters than the first and second quarters.&#160;&#160;Typically, this
pattern is the result of factors such as national holidays, customer demand and
economic conditions. Additionally, a significant portion of FASI&#8217;s</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">revenue
is derived from customers whose business levels are impacted by the
economy.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Purchased
Transportation</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Purchased
transportation increased by $17.7 million, or 12.1%, to $164.4 million in 2007
from $146.7 million in 2006.&#160;&#160;As a percentage of consolidated
operating revenue, purchased transportation was 41.9% during 2007 compared to
41.6% for 2006.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Forward
Air</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Forward
Air purchased transportation increased by $15.7 million, or 10.7%, to $162.4
million for 2007 from $146.7 million for 2006. As a percentage of Forward
Air&#160;operating revenue, purchased transportation was 43.1% during 2007
compared to 41.6% for 2006.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Purchased
transportation costs for Forward Air&#8217;s airport-to-airport network increased $4.7
million, or 3.9%, to $123.7 million for 2007 from $119.0 million for 2006.
During 2007 and 2006, airport-to-airport purchased transportation costs as a
percentage of airport-to-airport revenue was 39.5%.&#160;&#160;A 3.1% increase
in miles driven for the airport-to-airport network accounted for $3.7 million of
the increase in airport-to-airport purchased transportation. The increase in
airport-to-airport miles was due to changes in Forward Air&#8217;s shipping patterns
during the first half of 2007 as a result of changes in business mix, such as
increased shipments from our west coast terminals.&#160;&#160;Approximately $1.0
million of the increase in airport-to-airport purchased transportation is
attributable to a 0.8% increase in cost per mile.&#160;&#160;The increase in the
cost per mile is the result of increased customer utilization of Forward Air
Complete, which was introduced during the second half of 2006.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Purchased
transportation costs related to Forward Air&#8217;s logistics&#160;revenue increased
$9.9 million, or 43.4%, to $32.7 million for 2007 from $22.8 million for 2006.
For 2007, logistics&#8217; purchased transportation costs represented 76.8% of
logistics revenue versus 72.8% for 2006.&#160;&#160;During 2007, Forward Air
increased the number of miles driven to support logistics revenue by
60.5%.&#160;&#160;The increase in miles accounted for a $13.7 million increase
in logistics purchased transportation.&#160;&#160;However, the increase in
logistics purchased transportation due to miles was partially offset by a $3.8
million decrease in logistics purchased transportation as a result of a 10.5%
decrease in the logistics cost per mile.&#160;&#160;Logistics cost per mile
decreased due to increased capacity resulting in improved purchasing power from
third party transportation providers and to a lesser extent increased use of our
less costly owner operator network.&#160;&#160;The increase in logistics
purchased transportation costs as a percentage of revenue resulted from lower
revenue per mile as discussed above partially offset by the decrease in our
logistics cost per mile.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Purchased
transportation costs related to Forward Air&#8217;s other revenue increased $1.1
million, or 22.4%, to $6.0 million for 2007 from $4.9 million for 2006. Other
purchased transportation costs as a percentage of other revenue increased to
28.7% of other revenue for 2007 from 24.6% for 2006.&#160;&#160;&#160;The
increase in other purchased transportation is attributable to increased third
party transportation services associated with new value added
services.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">FASI</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">FASI
purchased transportation of $2.0 million represents costs associated with
payment of drivers, both networked owner operators and third party
transportation providers, for the transportation services provided to
FASI.&#160;&#160;FASI purchased transportation was 12.5% of the segment&#8217;s
operating revenue.&#160;&#160;Due to the nature of the services provided FASI
purchased transportation is lower as a percentage of revenue than our Forward
Air segment as a larger percentage of the transportation services are performed
by Company-employed drivers.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Salaries,
Wages, and Benefits</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Salaries,
wages and employee benefits increased by $14.4 million, or 19.4%, to $88.8
million for 2007 from $74.4 million in 2006.&#160;&#160;As a percentage of total
operating revenue, salaries, wages and employee benefits was 22.6% during 2007
compared to 21.1% for 2006.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">
        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">26</font></div>
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
          <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="HDR">
        <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Forward
Air</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Salaries,
wages and employee benefits were 21.8% of Forward Air operating revenue for 2007
compared to 21.1% for 2006. The increase in salaries, wages and employee
benefits as a percentage of revenue was attributable to increased costs for
share-</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">based
compensation and workers compensation claims.&#160;&#160;Share-based
compensation increased $2.4 million, or 0.6%</font></div>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">as a
percentage of Forward Air operating revenue, due to the issuance of stock
options and non-vested shares of common stock to key members of management and
non-employee directors during 2007.&#160;&#160;In addition, workers&#8217;
compensation expense increased $0.8 million, or 0.1% as a percentage of Forward
Air operating revenue, primarily due to a $0.7 million adjustment recorded in
June 2007 that resulted from our&#160;actuarial analysis of our reserves for
workers&#8217; compensation claims.&#160;&#160;The remaining increase in total dollars
is attributable to increases in our workforce to keep pace with the growth of
Forward Air&#8217;s business.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">FASI</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">FASI
salary, wages and employee benefits of $6.8 million represents costs associated
with payment of employees, mainly Company drivers and employees located at our
terminals since our acquisition of certain assets and liabilities of
USAC&#160;on July 30, 2007.&#160;&#160;FASI salary, wages and employee benefits
were 42.5% of the segment&#8217;s operating revenue.&#160;&#160;FASI salary, wages and
employee benefits are higher as a percentage of operating revenue than our
Forward Air segment, as a larger percentage of the transportation services are
performed by Company-employed drivers.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Operating
Leases</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Operating
leases increased by $2.3 million, or 15.9%, to $16.8 million for 2007 from $14.5
million in 2006.&#160;&#160;Operating leases, the largest component of which is
facility rent, were 4.3% of consolidated operating revenue for 2007 compared
with 4.1% in 2006.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Forward
Air</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Operating
leases were 4.2% of Forward Air operating revenue for 2007 compared with 4.1% in
2006.&#160;&#160;The increase in operating leases in total dollars and as a
percentage of operating revenue between periods was attributable to higher rent
costs associated with the expansion of certain facilities, offset by decreases
in facility rent due to the opening of Company-owned facilities.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">FASI</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">FASI
operating leases of $1.0 million primarily represents facility rent for FASI&#8217;s
11 facilities since our acquisition of certain assets and liabilities of
USAC&#160;on July 30, 2007.&#160;&#160;FASI does not currently own any of its
facilities.&#160;&#160;FASI operating leases were 6.3% of the segment&#8217;s
operating revenue.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Depreciation
and Amortization</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Depreciation
and amortization increased $2.0 million, or 22.5%, to $10.9 million for 2007
from $8.9 million in 2006.&#160;&#160;Depreciation and amortization was 2.8% of
consolidated operating revenue for 2007 compared with 2.5% in 2006.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Forward
Air</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Depreciation
and amortization expense as a percentage of Forward Air operating revenue was
2.8% for 2007 compared to 2.5% in 2006. The increase in depreciation and
amortization expense is due to increased depreciation related to our expanded
national hub in Columbus, Ohio, our new facilities in Chicago, Illinois and
Atlanta, Georgia, the implementation of TAP during the fourth quarter of 2006,
new tractors and trailers purchased during 2007 and the latter portion of 2006
and one month of amortization on acquired Black Hawk intangible
assets.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">FASI</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">FASI
depreciation and amortization of $0.5 million represents $0.3 million of
depreciation on acquired equipment and $0.2 million of amortization on acquired
intangible assets since our acquisition of certain assets and liabilities of
USAC on July 30, 2007.&#160;&#160;FASI depreciation and amortization expense as
a percentage of the segment&#8217;s operating revenue was 3.1%.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Insurance
and Claims</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Insurance
and claims expense increased $1.7 million, or 28.3%, to $7.7 million for 2007
from $6.0 million for 2006.&#160;&#160;Insurance and claims were 1.9% of
consolidated operating revenue during 2007 compared with 1.7% in
2006.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Forward
Air</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Insurance
and claims were 1.9% of Forward Air operating revenue during 2007 compared to
1.7% for 2006.&#160;&#160;The $1.2 million, or 20.0% increase in insurance and
claims is primarily the result of increased insurance premiums, current vehicle
claims and the associated legal fees.&#160;&#160;The increased insurance
premiums and claims result from our increased fleet size.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">
        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">27</font></div>
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
          <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="HDR">
        <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">FASI</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">FASI
insurance and claims of $0.5 million represents the cost of insurance premiums,
cargo claims, and accrued vehicle claims including the effects of actuarial
valuations since our acquisition of certain assets and liabilities of
USAC&#160;on July 30, 2007.&#160;&#160;FASI insurance and claims were 3.1% of
the segment&#8217;s operating revenue.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Other
Operating Expenses</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Other
operating expenses increased $6.3 million, or 23.5%, to $33.1 million during
2007 from $26.8 million in 2006.&#160;&#160;Other operating expenses were 8.4%
of consolidated operating revenue for 2007 compared with 7.6% in
2006.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Forward
Air</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Other
operating expenses were 8.0% of Forward Air operating revenue for 2007 compared
to 7.6% in 2006. The 0.4% increase in other operating expenses as a percentage
of operating revenue was primarily attributable to taxes, utilities and permits
associated with new or expanded facilities, facility relocation, specialized
training for key employees, increased fuel costs and additional sales and
marketing efforts due to the weak freight environment.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">FASI</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">FASI
other operating expenses of $2.8 million represent costs such as fuel costs for
Company vehicles, routine vehicle maintenance, utilities for our facilities, and
miscellaneous office and administrative expenses since our USAC
acquisition&#160;on July 30, 2007.&#160;&#160;FASI other operating expenses were
17.5% of the segment&#8217;s operating revenue.&#160;&#160;&#160;Other operating
expenses are higher as a percentage of revenue than our Forward Air segment due
to the higher utilization&#160;of&#160; Company-owned equipment.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Income
from operations</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Income
from operations decreased by $4.4 million, or 5.8%, to $71.0 million for 2007
compared with $75.4 million in 2006.&#160;&#160;Income from operations was 18.1%
of consolidated operating revenue for 2007 compared with 21.4% in
2006.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Forward
Air</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 9pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Income
from operations decreased by $6.8 million, or 9.0%, to $68.6 million for 2007
compared with $75.4 million for 2006.&#160;&#160;Income from operations
decreased as a percentage of Forward Air operating revenue to 18.2% for 2007
from 21.4% for 2006.&#160;&#160;The decrease in income from operations both in
total dollars and as a percentage of operating revenue is attributable to
increases in certain fixed and indirect costs, as outlined in the above
discussion, outpacing the increase in operating revenue and gross
profit.&#160;&#160;The decrease in income from operations as a percentage of
revenue was also a result of the change in our business mix resulting from
slower growth in revenue from the airport-to-airport service as a percentage of
total revenue and increased revenue from less profitable services such as
truckload service and Forward Air Complete.</font></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 9pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">FASI</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">FASI
income from operations since our acquisition of certain assets and liabilities
of USAC&#160;on July 30, 2007 was $2.4 million, or 15.0% of FASI
revenue.&#160;&#160;As discussed above, we expect the pool distribution business
to be highly seasonal and as a result of the timing of the USAC acquisition our
2007 results primarily include peak seasonal activity.&#160;&#160;Consequently,
we believe our 2008 income from operations as a percentage of operating revenue
will be lower than experienced during 2007.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Interest
Expense</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Interest
expense increased by $0.4 million to $0.5 million for 2007 compared with $0.1
million in 2006.&#160;&#160;The increase in interest expense was mostly the
result of $40.0 million in borrowings under our new line of credit facility
primarily to fund our acquisition of Black Hawk in December 2007 and repurchases
of our common stock.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Other
Income, net</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Other
income, net was $1.8 million, or 0.4% of operating revenue, for 2007 compared
with $3.2 million, or 0.9% as a </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">percentage
of operating revenue, for 2006. The decrease in other income was attributable to
lower interest income due to decreased average investment balances as a result
of cash used for stock repurchases, purchases of real property for new
facilities, and the acquisition&#160;of certain assets and liabilities of USAC
during 2007.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">
        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">28</font></div>
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
          <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="HDR">
        <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Provision
for Income Taxes</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The
combined federal and state effective tax rate for 2007 was 37.9% compared to a
rate of 37.7%<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">&#160;</font>for
the same period in 2006. Our effective federal and state rate increased to
provide for uncertain tax positions as required by Financial Accounting
Standards Board (&#8220;FASB&#8221;) Interpretation No. 48, <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">Accounting for Uncertainty in Income
Taxes (an interpretation of FASB Statement No. 109)</font>, (&#8220;FIN 48&#8221;) and for
the decrease in tax-exempt interest income during 2007 due to
acquisitions,&#160;increased capital expenditures and stock
repurchases.&#160;&#160;See further discussion of the impact of FIN 48 in the
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">Impact of Recent Accounting
Pronouncements </font>section.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Net
Income</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">As a
result of the foregoing factors, net income decreased by $4.0 million, or 8.2%,
to $44.9 million for 2007 compared to $48.9 million for 2006.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font></div><br>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">

            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="2%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">%</font></div>
            </td>

          <tr bgcolor="white">
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="30%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px">

              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;67.4</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="bottom" width="2%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="5%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">21.0</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="middle" width="2%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">%</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>

            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="7%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
          </tr>
          <tr bgcolor="white">
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="20%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Forward
      Air purchased transportation</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>

            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>

          <tr bgcolor="white">
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="20%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Total</font></font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>

            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
